game.name: Backflip Dive 3D
game.description:
It is always amazing to spot something really interesting and engaging especially when you have enough free time to pass! No need to get bored when you have this lovely brand new adventure challenge to try! Join Backflip Dive 3D and be prepared to jump from a crazy height and enjoy the adrenaline of flipping in the air! Your success will depend upon how wisely and perfectly you make the flips and land properly on the marked area.

Take your position and get ready to jump and flip over timely! Your proper attention to the game rules will guide you to make a perfect landing. Put your diving and flipping abilities to the test to complete all the tasks required to reach to the final platform! Grab your helmet, and head on to make a successful jump and prove yourself as a daredevil heart! The better you perform backflips, the easier you will be able to clear each level.

Try to earn at least a silver medal to complete each level in this HTML5 physics game! Hey! You can perform these challenging moves without being a professional gymnast. Get aware of the game mechanics by checking out the tutorial first in case if you are going to try it out first! There are 13 different and challenging areas and 13 unique levels to play through. Good luck to perform flips and landing on the target area perfectly! Check out free adventure games for boys and have a blast with your friends, no download required!
